definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The continental crust has an average composition similar to that of the igneous rock, andesite.
sentences.chinese: 一般说来大陆地壳的组成成分是火成岩和安山岩。

sentences.english: The "plum" jade is a kind of andesite with anamygdaloidal structure.
sentences.chinese: 河南汝阳梅花玉是一种杏仁状安山岩。

sentences.english: The possible existence of andesites on Mars is intriguing.
sentences.chinese: 火星上可能有安山岩存在，这很值得玩味。

sentences.english: The REE distribution pattern of the Xihu lake is similar to that of andesite .
sentences.chinese: 西湖沉积物稀土分布模式与安山岩相似。

sentences.english: Geochemical properties of the variolitic andesite from Susong in the Dabie orogenic belt, China.
sentences.chinese: 大别造山带宿松球颗结构安山岩的地球化学特征。

definition: rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
